description: User unable to send emails via Outlook.
resolution: Checked SMTP settings and reauthenticated the user account.
Reset the password and confirmed successful login.

description: Printer in HR department not responding.
resolution: Restarted the printer service and updated the printer driver.

description: Remote user unable to connect via VPN.
resolution: Diagnosed SSL VPN gateway issue and updated the client configuration.

description: Finance application crashes when loading reports.
resolution: Analyzed logs, found memory leak, and applied patch version 2.3.1.

description: Users report slow internet across multiple departments.
resolution: Checked network traffic and optimized router QoS settings.

description: User requested installation of MS Teams.
resolution: Installed MS Teams using approved company installer.
Updated spam filters and blocked malicious IP addresses.

description: New employee requests access to HR portal.
resolution: Created HR portal user account and assigned appropriate role.

description: Application throws database connection timeout errors.
resolution: Restarted DB service and increased connection pool size.

description: Calendar events not syncing on mobile device.
resolution: Removed and re-added the Exchange account, issue resolved.

description: Security system detected Trojan on user device.
resolution: Isolated system, removed malware, and updated antivirus definitions.

description: Unable to upload files to shared drive.
resolution: Checked folder permissions and re-enabled access rights.

description: User cannot connect to corporate WiFi.
resolution: Reset WiFi password and updated saved credentials.

description: Users cannot log in to ERP system.
resolution: Checked authentication service, restarted SSO, and verified access.

description: Emails taking too long to deliver to clients.
resolution: Reconfigured mail queue and purged pending outbound messages.
Replaced HDMI cable and updated graphics driver.

description: Nightly database backup failed due to space shortage.
resolution: Cleared old backups and increased disk quota.

description: User account locked after multiple failed attempts.
resolution: Unlocked account and advised on password reset policy.

category: +Reconnected printer to network and updated driver mapping."
